description:
This market refers to the LoL match between Team WE and EDward Gaming in the LPL Group Perseverance, scheduled for January 16 at 6:00AM ET.

This market will resolve to "Team WE" if Team WE secures the most kills across all games in the match. 

This market will resolve to "EDward Gaming" if EDward Gaming secures the most kills across all games in the match.

If both teams secure the same number of kills across all games in the match, this market will resolve 50-50.

If the match is canceled (not played at all), ends in a tie, or is delayed beyond 7 days from the scheduled date without a winner determined, this market will resolve to 50-50. 

If the match begins but is not completed, and one team wins due to the opponent's forfeiture, disqualification, or walkover, this market will resolve to 50-50. 

If the match ends in a forfeit, disqualification, or walkover (team withdraws before the start and the other wins automatically), this market will resolve to 50-50.

events.description:
This market will resolve to "Team WE" if Team WE win against EDward Gaming in the named LoL match in the LPL Split 1 Group Perseverance, scheduled for January 16 at 6:00AM ET.

This market will resolve to "EDward Gaming" if EDward Gaming win against Team WE in the LoL match.

If the game is postponed, this market will remain open until the game has been completed.

If the game is canceled entirely, with no make-up game, this market will resolve 50-50.

The resolution source for this market will be official information from https://liquipedia.net/leagueoflegends/Main_Page.
events.title: LoL: Team WE vs EDward Gaming (BO3) - LPL Group Perseverance

question: Series: Most kills?
